title: Clich
description:
Simplify Your Fundraising with Clich! 🚀
Looking for investors? Whether you're in the Pre-Seed or Seed stage, Clich can save you hours with our one-pager, designed and approved by hundreds of investors. One link instead of thousands of words.

How It Works:
1. Fill out your details.
2. Add your Calendly link.
3. Generate your company link.
4. Share it through LinkedIn or email.
PS: You can update your information in real-time, anytime.

➡️ Join now and make fundraising easier!
